H0.text: Who was the man behind The Chipmunks. Ross Bagdasarian

H1.text: Who was the man behind The Chipmunks. Walt Disney

H2.text: Who was the man behind The Chipmunks. Chuck Jones

H3.text: Who was the man behind The Chipmunks. David Seville

A4.text: The character was created by Ross Bagdasarian.

A5.text: David 'Dave' Seville is a fictional character; he is the adoptive father, producer and manager of the fictional singing group Alvin and the Chipmunks.
